#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	int fact[2002],i;
	
	fact[0]=1;
	int digits=1;
	int temp,carry=0;
	
	for(i=2;i<=n;i++){
		for(int j=0;j<digits;j++){
			temp= fact[j]*i + carry;
			carry = temp/10;
			fact[j]= temp%10;
		}
		
		while(carry){
			fact[digits++]= carry%10;
			carry= carry/10;
		}
	}
	
	for(i=digits-1;i>=0;i--)
	cout<<fact[i];
	
	return 0;
}
